column4: can anybody enlighten me on the latest ati driver's (non repository) compatibillity with the repos. compiz?
it works without xserver-xgl. If you use http://wiki.cchtml.com/index.php/Ubuntu_Gutsy_Installation_Guide it should integrate reasonably well
hm, it's saying that the 8.3 version won't work with gutsy, it needs a more recent X. That's new
